title: Save a photo from a text or link on Android

steps.text: Open the message or webpage where you see the photo.
steps.tts: Open the message or webpage where you see the photo.

steps.text: Press and hold on the photo for about one second.
steps.tts: Press and hold on the photo for about one second.

steps.text: When a menu appears, tap "Save image" or "Download."
steps.tts: When a menu appears, tap Save image or Download.

steps.text: The photo is now in your Photos or Gallery app.
steps.tts: The photo is now in your Photos or Gallery app.
